official_title: Enhanced Recovery After Surgery in Extremity Sarcoma
inclusion_criteria:
* Any patient at Vanderbilt University Medical Center treated with surgical excision of a suspected extremity sarcoma
* Adult patients >17 years of age
* Patients of all preoperative opioid status (na√Øve or dependent)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Patients treated non-operatively
* Non-English speaking patients
